cvd-sol-spot.name: CVD ETH Spot

perps-premium.script:
perpAvg = (BYBIT:ETHUSD.close + FTX:ETH-PERP.close + BITMEX:ETHUSD.close + BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusd_perp.close) / 4

spotAvg = (COINBASE:ETH-USD.close + BINANCE:ethusdt.close + BITFINEX:ETHUSD.close)/3

premium = perpAvg - spotAvg
baseline = 0

plotcloudarea(premium, baseline, title=PerpPrem)
perps-premium.name: Perps Premium

delta-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:ethusdt.vbuy+BINANCE:ethusdc.vbuy+BITFINEX:ETHUSD.vbuy+BITSTAMP:ethusd.vbuy+BITSTAMP:ethusdt.vbuy+BITSTAMP:ethusdc.vbuy+COINBASE:ETH-USDC.vbuy+COINBASE:ETH-USD.vbuy+COINBASE:ETH-USDT.vbuy+FTX:ETH/USD.vbuy+FTX:ETH/USDT.vbuy+HUOBI:ethusdt.vbuy+HUOBI:ethusdc.vbuy+KRAKEN:ETH/USDC.vbuy+KRAKEN:ETH/USDT.vbuy+KRAKEN:ETH/USD.vbuy+OKEX:ETH-USDT.vbuy+OKEX:ETH-USDC.vbuy+POLONIEX:USDT_ETH.vbuy+POLONIEX:USDC_ETH.vbuy)

_vsell = (BINANCE:ethusdt.vsell+BINANCE:ethusdc.vsell+BITFINEX:ETHUSD.vsell+BITSTAMP:ethusd.vsell+BITSTAMP:ethusdt.vsell+BITSTAMP:ethusdc.vsell+COINBASE:ETH-USDC.vsell+COINBASE:ETH-USD.vsell+COINBASE:ETH-USDT.vsell+FTX:ETH/USD.vsell+FTX:ETH/USDT.vsell+HUOBI:ethusdt.vsell+HUOBI:ethusdc.vsell+KRAKEN:ETH/USDC.vsell+KRAKEN:ETH/USDT.vsell+KRAKEN:ETH/USD.vsell+OKEX:ETH-USDT.vsell+OKEX:ETH-USDC.vsell+POLONIEX:USDT_ETH.vsell+POLONIEX:USDC_ETH.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Delta Spot")
delta-spot.name: Delta Spot

delta-perps.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusdt.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusd_perp.vbuy+BITFINEX:ETHF0:USTF0.vbuy+BITMEX:ETHUSD.vbuy+BYBIT:ETHUSD.vbuy+BYBIT:ETHUSDT.vbuy+DERIBIT:ETH-PERPETUAL.vbuy+FTX:ETH-PERP.vbuy+HUOBI:ETH-USD.vbuy+KRAKEN:PI_ETHUSD.vbuy+OKEX:ETH-USDT-SWAP.vbuy+OKEX:ETH-USD-SWAP.vbuy)

_vsell = (BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusdt.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusd_perp.vsell+BITFINEX:ETHF0:USTF0.vsell+BITMEX:ETHUSD.vsell+BYBIT:ETHUSD.vsell+BYBIT:ETHUSDT.vsell+DERIBIT:ETH-PERPETUAL.vsell+FTX:ETH-PERP.vsell+HUOBI:ETH-USD.vsell+KRAKEN:PI_ETHUSD.vsell+OKEX:ETH-USDT-SWAP.vsell+OKEX:ETH-USD-SWAP.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Delta Perps")
delta-perps.name: Delta Perps

allmarkets.script:
plotline(BITFINEX:ETHUSD.close, color=rgb(151,197,84), title=Bitfinex.spot)
plotline(BINANCE:ethusdt.close, color=yellow, title=Binance.spot)
plotline(OKEX:ETH-USDT.close, color=transparent, title=Okex.spot)
plotline(KRAKEN:ETH/USD.close, color=transparent, title=Kraken.spot)
plotline(COINBASE:ETH-USD.close, color=rgb(22,82,240), title=Coinbase.spot)
plotline(POLONIEX:USDT_ETH.close, color=transparent, title=Poloniex.spot)
plotline(HUOBI:ethusdt.close, color=transparent, title=Huobi.spot)
plotline(BITSTAMP:ethusd.close, color=transparent, title=Bitstamp.spot)
plotline(BITMEX:ETHUSD.close, color=rgb(255,71,71), title=Bitmex.perp)
plotline(BITFINEX:ETHF0:USTF0.close, color=transparent, title=Bitfinex.perp)
plotline(OKEX:ETH-USD-SWAP.close, color=transparent, title=Okex.perp)
plotline(BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusdt.close, color=transparent, title=Binance.perp)
plotline(BINANCE_FUTURES:ethusd_perp.close, color=transparent, title=Binance.perp)
plotline(HUOBI:ETH-USD.close, color=transparent, title=Huobi.perp)
plotline(KRAKEN:PI_ETHUSD.close, color=transparent, title=Kraken.perp)
plotline(DERIBIT:ETH-PERPETUAL.close, color=transparent, title=Deribit.perp)
plotline(FTX:ETH-PERP.close, color=rgb(94,98,98), title=Ftx.perp)
plotline(BYBIT:ETHUSD.close, color=rgb(255,177,26), title=Bybit.perp)
allmarkets.name: All markets

delta-binance-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:ethusdt.vbuy+BINANCE:ethusdc.vbuy)

_vsell = (BINANCE:ethusdt.vsell+BINANCE:ethusdc.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Binance Spot")
delta-binance-spot.name: Delta Binance Spot

delta-coinbase.script:
_vbuy = (COINBASE:ETH-USDC.vbuy+COINBASE:ETH-USD.vbuy+COINBASE:ETH-USDT.vbuy)

_vsell = (COINBASE:ETH-USDC.vsell+COINBASE:ETH-USD.vsell+COINBASE:ETH-USDT.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Coinbase Spot")
delta-coinbase.name: Delta Coinbase

delta-bybit-perps.name: Delta Bybit Perps

a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="BitMex Perp")
delta-bitmex.name: Delta BitMex

delta-ftx-spot.script:
_vbuy = (FTX:ETH/USD.vbuy+FTX:ETH/USDT.vbuy)

_vsell = (FTX:ETH/USD.vsell+FTX:ETH/USDT.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)

delta-ftx-spot.name: Delta FTX Spot

delta-bitfinex-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BITFINEX:ETHUSD.vbuy)

_vsell = (BITFINEX:ETHUSD.vsell)

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (_vbuy-_vsell), color: _vbuy - _vsell > 0 ? options.upColor : options.downColor}, title=Bitfinex Spot)
delta-bitfinex-spot.name: Delta BitFinex Spot
